title: Watch: The Wipeout That Cost Tadej Poga훾ar a Chance to Win Paris-Roubaix
content:
Video: The key moment of Paris-Roubaix came when Tadej Poga훾ar overcooked a corner, crashed and lost Van der Poel's wheel: 'If it wasn't for that mistake it would have been the two of us on the velodrome.'

author: ahood
